text: Kris Rinne is a technology person and retired Senior VP of network technology at AT&T; Labs. She was an inductee to the 2013 Wireless Hall of FameFierce Wireless and the 2014 Women in Technology International Hall of Fame. She has been described as a key person in wireless technologies for her AT&T; work.WITI Hall of Fame page == References == Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:AT&T; people Category:American women computer scientists Category:American computer scientists
title: Kris Rinne
